title: WebKit Security Response Manager
summary: Join us in building the best, most secure browser engine! We’re looking for a person to manage a team of software engineers who make sure we respond quickly and correctly to security bugs.
description: In this role, you will manage a team that fixes security bugs and works strategically to prevent security issues. You’ll collaborate across teams across Apple to drive security improvements in our browser and the underlying platforms.
key_qualifications:
Experience with mentoring, career development, project planning, and executive reporting.
Strong understanding of the kinds of security issues that arise in C++ and how to address them.
Technical understanding of software release schedules.
education_experience: BS in Computer Science or equivalent education or work experience
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package...
